Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: Luis Cesar
Reviews.Content: It is a beautiful piece. It has many features and I hope will last almost forever. Important to mention that I started using it few days ago.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's a nice computer.  I gave it four stars instead of five as I really dislike Windows 8.  It does have Windows 8.1 though - so it has a Windows7 icon you can go on from the main screen.  I'm still learning how to use it.  I miss the back arrow to get out of a screen.  It's frustrating.  The company I bought from is a good company.  Delivery was fast and the company was very professional.  I like the blu-ray cd/dvd drawer.  The computer runs fast and the keyboard is nice.  All in all it's a good computer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Rayner Durango Espinoza
Reviews.Content: It met my expectations. Good price compared to the competition. Light to be a 15-inch notebook. Thank you Toshiba. Recommended.
